member.name: T:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute
member.summary: Attribute class to define metadata for add-ins within the system.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets URl of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Icon
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon image of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.GuidID
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique name of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the caption or title for the add-in, usually for display purposes.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Hidden
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the add-in is hidden in the UI. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.iconimage
member.summary: Gets or sets the path or identifier for the icon image of the add-in. Defaults to null.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of object the add-in is associated with.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.ClassType
member.summary: Gets or sets the class type of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.key
member.summary: Gets or sets a unique integer key to identify the add-in. Defaults to -1.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.misc
member.summary: Gets or sets additional miscellaneous data associated with the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.parentkey
member.summary: Gets or sets an integer key identifying the parent of this add-in, if applicable. Defaults to -1.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.menu
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the menu or menu item the add-in is associated with.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.order
member.summary: Gets or sets the display order of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.displayType
member.summary: Gets or sets the display type of the add-in, defined by the DisplayType enum.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.addinType
member.summary: Gets or sets the add-in type, defined by the AddinType enum.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Showin
member.summary: Gets or sets where the add-in should be shown, defined by the ShowinType enum.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets the data source category, defined by the DatasourceCategory enum. Defaults to NONE.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.DatasourceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data source type, defined by the DataSourceType enum. Defaults to NONE.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.FileType
member.summary: Gets or sets the file type or data format the add-in is associated with.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.returndataTypename
member.summary: Gets or sets the type name of the data returned by the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.DefaultCreate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the add-in should be created by default.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a detailed description of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.AddinAttribute.IsHomePage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the add-in represents a home page or primary interface component.

member.name: T:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets URl of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.GuidID
member.summary: Gets or sets the icon image of the add-in.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique name of the command.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the caption or title for the command, usually for display purposes.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Hidden
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command is hidden in the UI. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Click
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command is triggered on a single click. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.DoubleClick
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command is triggered on a double click. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.iconimage
member.summary: Gets or sets the path or identifier for the icon image of the command. Defaults to null.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.PointType
member.summary: Gets or sets the point type for the command, defined by the EnumPointType enum.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of object the command is associated with.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.ClassType
member.summary: Gets or sets the class type of the command.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.misc
member.summary: Gets or sets additional miscellaneous data associated with the command.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Category
member.summary: Gets or sets the data source category, defined by the DatasourceCategory enum. Defaults to NONE.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.DatasourceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data source type, defined by the DataSourceType enum. Defaults to NONE.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Showin
member.summary: Gets or sets where the command should be shown, defined by the ShowinType enum. Defaults to Both.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.IsLeftAligned
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the command is left-aligned in the UI. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:TheTechIdea.Beep.Vis.CommandAttribute.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the display order of the command. Defaults to 0.
